idea-plugin.name: CommentShell
idea-plugin.description:
CommentShell (CSL) provides you to write shell commands and run them in single-line comments, for more usage details, please see github.
Supported language and files
  • .gitignore
  • Antlr(g4)
  • Api(go-zero)
  • Dart
  • Dockerfile
  • Drools
  • Gherkin
  • Gradle
  • Groovy
  • Html
  • Java
  • JavaScript
  • JFlex
  • JSPX
  • Kotlin
  • Lua
  • Perl
  • PHP
  • Properties
  • Proto
  • Python
  • R
  • React
  • Ruby
  • Rust
  • Scala
  • SQl
  • TypeScript
  • Vue
  • XML
  • YAML
    • and more languages which supported single-line comment
